items.title: What images and videos tell us about why Swiss bar fire spread so quickly
items.description: How the blaze took hold with such ferocity, killing at least 40 people and leaving many more critically injured, is now a key focus for officials.

items.title: Swiss bar fire likely started by sparklers on champagne bottles
items.description: The investigation into the fire that killed 40 people will consider whether criminal prosecutions are necessary, officials said.

items.title: Zelensky names spy chief to head presidential office
items.description: Kyrylo Budanov has led the Hur military intelligence, which has claimed a number of highly-effective strikes against Russia.

items.title: 'Living a nightmare': Families of teens missing after ski resort fire desperate for news
items.description: Families are appealing for information about children as young as 15 who are thought to have been at the bar.

items.title: Trump warns US will intervene if Iran kills protesters
items.description: The US president says "we will come to their rescue" after days of demonstrations and clashes.
